replies.body:
Riot Staff:

A. Challenger, Team Skins and Champion Skins are mislabelled in the bottom panel before FAQ.
B. The graphic with the arrows: T2 and T3 are mislabelled.
Is it just me or not that I'm not getting the tier3 recall animation? Skt icon btw

The icon level 3 doesnt work in aram please riot people can you fix this, i am an avid aram player not really much ranked till next season most likely, I purchased the  level 3 icon for the sole reason of spamming it in aram, they let us use recall animations in aram, please let us use stage 3 icon too ^_^ 

thank you :D

Dear Riot Games, a very weird thing has happened to my summoner icons and when i equip the tier 1 icon and go into a game it gives the tier 2 emote and when i use the tier 2 icon it gives me the tier 3 emote and for the tier 3 emote i have the tier 1 emote but i still have the recall. Do you know what is causing this?
anyone know how long the championship skins are available for?

He’s hitting the store for 975 RP** 
> from September 27 through 18:59 November 7 along with the rest of the esports legacy skins**. 25% of sales from Championship Zed and the Championship Ward will contribute to the Worlds prize pool as part of our work to open new esports revenue streams.
—

Release the STAR GUARDIAN skins!
Spend mode is on!{{summoner:6}}

Question: If we buy a team icon we can flash it using the mastery emote and it replaces any mastery emotes we might have on the champion that much is clear. It can be upgraded via hextech crafting to T2 and T3, what about the 1IP World Championship Icon? T1 doesn't have an emote but it can still be upgraded in hextech crafting. Is there any point to upgrading?

"Crafting materials will expire at 23:59 PST on November 6 along with the team emotes, recalls, and leftover PROJECT crafting materials as well."   HI RIOT. Does this mean, all out PROJECT cores will be gone? If so, I am gonna dischant them quickly before it expires. Also would the emotes work later on? Because it some how feels like a bit of a waste if its only for these few weeks :(.
1. {{champion:92}} i think Riven skin 2016 is not before the good-looking :(

Holy crap
I'm going to be broke after this BUT ITS WORTH IT! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Wait... so if we can buy all of the championship skins why are people making such a fuss about riven?
Championship {{champion:238}}, if only i had rp
2:31 am on the 27th here and still not out{{item:3348}} {{item:3348}}  open till its up xD
1:15 am here still waiting on zed lol.{{item:3070}}
There's no extra information explaining that the Riven Championship skin is different from original one. Refund!!?!
